book1.title: Giai Tich 2
book1.author: Nguyen Dinh Huy
book1.description: Giai Tich 2 is a comprehensive book on advanced calculus, covering topics such as multivariable calculus, vector calculus, and differential equations. It is designed for students in mathematics and engineering fields.

book2.title: Computer Networking: A Top-Down Approach
book2.author: James F. Kurose, Keith W. Ross
book2.description: A widely used textbook that introduces computer networking concepts using a top-down approach, starting from applications and moving downward through transport, network, and link layers.

paper1.title: Attention Is All You Need
paper1.author: Vaswani et al.
paper1.description: A landmark paper introducing the Transformer architecture, which relies entirely on attention mechanisms and has become foundational for modern NLP models.

book3.title: Đắc Nhân Tâm
book3.author: Dale Carnegie
book3.description: Phiên bản tiếng Việt của 'How to Win Friends and Influence People', một trong những cuốn sách kỹ năng sống nổi tiếng và có ảnh hưởng nhất thế giới.
